General.Name: Econergy Renewable Energy Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Econergy Renewable Energy Ltd, an independent power producer company, develops, owns, and operates utility-scale renewable energy projects. The company's renewable energy projects produces and supplies power. It has solar, wind, and bio-gas plants. The company is headquartered in Kfar Saba, Israel.

1.Name: Mr. Yoav  Shapira
1.Title: Deputy CEO, VP of Operations & Director
